Urban Exploration

Urban exploration is the exploration of man-made structures, usually abandoned ruins or not usually seen components of the man-made environment.

About us

The dreamers, the doers, and the donut-lovers. (some do prefer locally grown fruits and vegetables though..just so we're clear.)
